title: Survival of the fittest
creator_contributor_role: St Mary's Anglican Girls' College, creator
abstract: When scientific change clashes with nature. 'Screen It' 2015 Winner - Secondary Live Action.
description: 'Survival of the Fittest' constructs the core message that human genetics should not be altered, despite good intentions. Based on a scientific theory by Herbert Spencer that relates to how organisms evolve over time to develop desirable traits. The film explores how scientists can artificially replicate a natural process, which can lead to a negative outcome.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: VoD Program; B2003152; 'Screen It' 2015 [winning entries and special mentions]; Active; 2015
